// src/components/HomePage.js - 完整结构 import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { BarChart3, FolderOpen, Workflow, ArrowRight, Award, Clock, Shield, Brain, Users, Target, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; const HomePage = ({ setCurrentPage }) => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('home'); // 监听滚动以更新导航状态 useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const sections = ['hero', 'about', 'services', 'features']; const scrollPosition = window.scrollY + 100; for (const section of sections) { const element = document.getElementById(section); if (element) { const { offsetTop, offsetHeight } = element; if (scrollPosition >= offsetTop && scrollPosition < offsetTop + offsetHeight) { const pageMap = { 'hero': 'home', 'about': 'about', 'services': 'services', 'features': 'home' }; setActiveSection(pageMap[section] || 'home'); break; } } } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); const stats = [ { number: '800+', label: 'Skill Database' }, { number: '6', label: 'Domains' }, { number: '84+%', label: 'Success Rate' } ]; const services = [ { id: 'single', icon: BarChart3, title: 'Single Analysis', description: 'Extract cybersecurity skill keywords from a single job description across 6 specialized domains.', features: ['Real-time analysis', 'AI-powered extraction', 'Detailed reports'] }, { id: 'batch', icon: FolderOpen, title: 'Batch Processing', description: 'Upload multiple cybersecurity job ads and extract structured skill data efficiently.', features: ['Bulk file processing', 'CSV export', 'Progress tracking'] }, { id: 'course', icon: Workflow, title: 'Course Mapping', description: 'Align course content with real-world cybersecurity job market requirements.', features: ['Curriculum alignment', 'Gap analysis', 'Learning pathways'] } ]; const features = [ { icon: Award, title: 'Industry Alignment', description: 'Continuously updated with the latest skill sets and technology demands from the cybersecurity job market, ensuring alignment with real-world industry needs.' }, { icon: Brain, title: 'AI-Enhanced Skill Analysis', description: 'Powered by large language models and Sparse Encoder techniques to extract and interpret skills accurately while capturing contextual variations across job descriptions.' }, { icon: Clock, title: 'Timely Delivery', description: 'Fast processing times with real-time analysis and instant results delivery.' }, { icon: Shield, title: 'Privacy by Design', description: 'No user data is stored or transmitted to external servers. All analyses are performed locally with LLMs deployed on edge servers to ensure privacy, control, and compliance.' } ]; const aboutFeatures = [ { icon: Users, title: '500+ Global Clients', description: 'Trusted by organizations worldwide for accurate skill analysis and job market insights.' }, { icon: Target, title: '6 Cybersecurity Domains', description: 'Specialized expertise across Security Architecture, Analysis, Consulting, Operations, Information Security, and Testing.' }, { icon: Zap, title: 'AI-Powered Technology', description: 'Cutting-edge algorithms that deliver 98% accuracy in skill extraction and matching.' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Background Elements */}
AI-Powered Analysis Platform

Strategic Solutions for{' '} Skill Analysis And Curriculum Mapping

Transform job descriptions into actionable skill insights with our AI-powered analysis platform, which helps students explore career-aligned skills and enables educators to map course content across six cybersecurity domains.

{/* Stats */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Hero Visual */}
{['Security Analysis', 'Cloud Security', 'Network Security'].map((skill, index) => (
{skill}
))}
Match Score 95%
{/* About Section - 使用你现有的AboutPage内容 */}

About Our Platform

We Help Organizations Bridge the Gap Between Cybersecurity Job Market Demands and University Curriculum Design

6 Domains
AI
Powered
Real-time
Analysis

Transforming Cybersecurity Skill Analysis with Advanced Technology

Our platform leverages machine learning model to analyze cybersecurity job descriptions and extract meaningful skill requirements across 6 specialized domains. We help organizations understand market demands and align their training programs accordingly.

Leveraging a hybrid pipeline of machine learning and rule-based techniques, our system has analyzed thousands of cybersecurity job descriptions to support curriculum design and workforce development. We employ an SVM-based classifier combined with rule-based logic to categorize job roles, and use a KeyBERT + rule-based extractor to identify relevant skill keywords. Extracted skills are then interpreted using the Qwen-0.6B language model to enhance student understanding. Finally, a Sparse Encoder is applied to semantically map extracted skills to course-provided skill sets, enabling accurate curriculum-to-market alignment.

6 Specialized Domains

Analysis across CyberSecurity Architect, Analyst, Consultant, Operations, Testers, and Information Security.

Expert Team

User-centric design supporting curriculum alignment and career guidance across cybersecurity fields.

Proven Results

Resource-efficient implementation enabling fast and scalable skill extraction.

Secure Platform

Enterprise-grade security for your sensitive data and analysis.

{/* Cybersecurity Domains Section */}

Our 6 Cybersecurity Domains

{[ { title: 'CyberSecurity Architect', desc: 'Design and oversee secure architectures across systems and networks', color: 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-800' }, { title: 'CyberSecurity Analyst', desc: 'Monitor, detect, and respond to security incidents in real-time', color: 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800' }, { title: 'CyberSecurity Consultant', desc: 'Advise clients on security strategies, controls, and risk mitigation', color: 'bg-orange-100 text-orange-800' }, { title: 'CyberSecurity Operations', desc: 'Maintain and support core security infrastructure and respond to events', color: 'bg-green-100 text-green-800' }, { title: 'Information Security', desc: 'Manage information protection strategies, compliance, and governance', color: 'bg-teal-100 text-teal-800' }, { title: 'CyberSecurity Testers', desc: 'Conduct security testing and identify vulnerabilities through simulated attacks', color: 'bg-pink-100 text-pink-800' } ].map((domain, index) => (
{domain.title}

{domain.desc}

))}
{/* Process Section */}

Our Analysis Process

Why Choose Our Platform

Designed for both students and educators, our platform delivers accurate insights into real-world cybersecurity job trends and helps map course content to industry-required skills.
